description:
The Langenberg was the Imperial flagship of Rear Admiral http://anidb.net/ch817 [Patolicken].
The Langenberg participated in the Eighth Battle of Iserlohn in 798 UC as part of Admiral Kempff`s fleet. As Patolicken`s flagship, it headed the effort (along with Rear Admiral http://anidb.net/ch816 [Eihendorf]`s fleet) to rescue the http://anidb.net/ch236 [MÃ¼ller]`s fleet from an ambush by the http://anidb.net/ch737 [Yang]`s fleet.
Later in the battle, the Kempf`s fleet was encircled and devastated by enemy fire, and the Langenberg was destroyed.
Source: Gineipaedia
name: Langenberg
